name: MXC Fuel Canister
description: The MXC Fuel Canister is purchased from theWorkshopon the Space Station and is used forBiofuelstorage. It comes prefilled with fuel when purchased and can be refilled at theBiofuel Composter,Electric Composteror by interacting with aPortable Biofuel Tankdeployed on the ground. It can be taken back to Orbit and will remain filled, allowing the Prospector to use it across multiple prospects. It does not fill when returned to station. It holds 10 liters of Biofuel.
